content.text: Hi there!
Hi! How are you doing?
I'm doing great! I'm a scientist and I just got back from a trip to the Galapagos Islands. It was amazing!
Wow, that sounds awesome! I've always wanted to go to the Galapagos Islands. What was your favorite part of the trip?
My favorite part was seeing all the amazing wildlife. We saw giant tortoises, blue-footed boobies, and sea lions. It was incredible!
That sounds amazing! I'm so jealous!
It was really incredible. I'm glad I got to experience it.
I bet you are. I'm sure it was a once in a lifetime experience.
It definitely was. I'm already planning my next trip!
That's awesome! I hope you have a great time on your next trip.
Thanks! I'm sure I will.
What kind of scientist are you?
I'm a marine biologist. I study the ocean and its creatures.
That's awesome! I've always been fascinated by the ocean.
It's a fascinating place! There's so much to learn about it.
I bet there is! I wish I could be a marine biologist.
You can always do it! It's never too late to change your career.
I know, but I don't know if I'm smart enough.
You're smart enough! You just have to believe in yourself.
Thanks for the encouragement! I'll think about it.
You're welcome! I hope you do.
Thanks!
